articles.content: Yet, Raphael, the son of a painter, who grew up at court in Urbino, enjoyed astonishingly swift success. He ended up, by his mid-30s, as the pre-eminent artist in Rome, unscathed by the back-stabbing… [+5025 chars]

Also, if anything, we need a "Night Of 1,000 Ru Masks" runway theme next season.
